title: Agent Workflow Optimization
subtitle: Process Isolation & Statistical Validation
summary: Analysis of agent workflow performance vs single-inference optimization, demonstrating that agent tasks require different optimization strategies than single-inference workloads.
key_findings: Agent tasks require different optimization than single-inference
Optimal config for agents: GPU=60, CTX=512, TEMP=0.8
Process isolation critical for accurate benchmarking
Automated scoring methodology validates report quality
